alert.note: Alert for Southern Johnson County; Southern and Eastern Logan County; Western and Northern Logan County (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 24 at 3:30PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Logan and southwestern Johnson Counties through 400 PM CDT... At 329 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Clarksville, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Clarksville... Paris... Lamar... Knoxville... Subiaco... Hartman... Scranton... Hoyt... Hinkle... Midway in Logan County... Spadra... Tokalon... Lake Dardanelle... Coal Hill... Morrison Bluff... New Spadra... Dublin... Ludwig... Piney Bay Recreation Area... Delaware... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Southern Johnson County; Southern and Eastern Logan County; Western and Northern Logan County
